title: It Seems the Goddess wants me to Blow up Normies - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Childish Protagonist   Chuunibyou   Fantasy World   Goddesses   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Oneshot   Reincarnation   Returning from Another World   Short Story   Transported to Another World
author: Akari   ç¯
description:
December 25
If anyone is happy with this day, drop dead! I'm sure there are some who think that. 
A month ago I was the latter.

Now?
I'm sorry, but I'm so excited, I'm in front of the station looking forward to it.
Actual reality isn't bad either!! It's the beginning of a happy day.
I did my research and a gift is prepared and ready.

What? Strange illumination at my feet?
That there is such a mechanism at the station, Christmas is amazing......>
